original_title: Air Arabia – Abu Dhabi receives FAOC to fly to Colombo
original_body_lines: Air Arabia Abu Dhabi received the Foreign Air Operator Certificate (FAOC)  from the Civil Aviation Authority of Sri Lanka after satisfying the necessary technical and operational requirements.

The FAOC was handed over by, Director General of Civil Aviation  & Chief Executive Officer (DGCA & CEO) P. A. Jayakantha to  Shibin Nazeem – Accountable Manager & Sales Manager of Air Arabia – Abu Dhabi.
